# autoglue_credential (Data Source)

Reads an Autoglue credential by ID.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `id` (String) Credential ID to look up.

### Read-Only

- `account_id` (String) Cloud account ID.
- `created_at` (String) Creation timestamp.
- `credential_provider` (String) Credential provider.
- `kind` (String) Credential kind.
- `name` (String) Credential name.
- `region` (String) Cloud region.
- `schema_version` (Number) Schema version.
- `scope` (Map of String) Scope metadata associated with the credential.
- `scope_kind` (String) Logical scope kind.
- `scope_version` (Number) Scope version.
- `updated_at` (String) Last update timestamp.
